transcript:
If you can contract a muscle very hard
to the point where it almost
feels like it's cramping
if you can do that, even
when there's no weight
in your hand or there's
no resistance against it
so you're just using your mind
muscle connection to contract
that muscle hard and isolate it,
chances are you'll be able
to generate hypertrophy
and strength gains pretty
easily in that muscle compared
to muscles that you have
a harder time activating.
